original_text: The system shall require users to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds.
units: The system shall require users to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds .
to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds

original_text:
**Liveness**  
All submitted selfie videos must undergo biometric liveness detection compliant with ISO/IEC 30107-3 standards.
units:
* * Liveness * *  
 All submitted selfie videos must undergo biometric liveness detection compliant with ISO / IEC 30107 - 3 standards .

original_text: To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts, the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower.
units: To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts
To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts , the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower .

original_text: Submissions failing this threshold shall be rejected automatically, prompting users to submit a new video.
units: Submissions failing this threshold shall be rejected automatically , prompting users to submit a new video .
prompting users to submit a new video

original_text: Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution.
units: Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution .
initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution

original_text: All biometric templates generated from user submissions must be securely stored utilizing AES-256-GCM encryption.
units: All biometric templates generated from user submissions must be securely stored utilizing AES-256 - GCM encryption .

original_text: To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e) regarding data retention limits, stored biometric templates shall be purged from the system after a retention period of five years.
units: To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e ) regarding data retention limits
To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e ) regarding data retention limits , stored biometric templates shall be purged from the system after a retention period of five years .
